EmailTemplate.subject: More Memory and Premium Service Plans - Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get more application memory and production ready service plans Good News! As a current Pivotal Web Service <http://run.pivotal.io> (PWS) user, you are receiving an early invitation to upgrade your account before anyone else.
Upgrade now to receive: - Immediate access to 10GB of application memory at $.03/GB/HR
- Access to premium service plans with more resources via the Marketplace
We’ve made a lot of improvements recently and are eager to get your feedback:
- Deploy your app with our new super-fast command line tool - Experience the redesigned Developer Console - Learn more from our updated documentation and forums LOG IN NOW <https://run.pivotal.io> Regards,
The Pivotal Web Services Team
P.S. After you login you’ll see the remaining number of days before your free trial will expire. Upgrade soon to keep your access to Pivotal Web Services.
Questions? Email us <mailto:feedback@run.pivotal.io>.
